Posts.Content: Jun 16, 2012 04:52PM bangotti40 wrote: High ER (99%) and high PR (97%) and my oncotype came back in the low range.  My KI67 was in the high range (30?) so I really think it was the high ER and PR scores that made my oncotype low.  I've read from my MO that the ER/PR scores are a huge determining factor in the oncotype score.
Posts.Title: Another Oncotype question mary71 Scarlet2

Posts.Content: Mar 25, 2012 10:08AM bangotti40 wrote: I chose bilateral...I like symmetry!  I have no regrets.

Posts.Content: May 22, 2012 12:25AM bangotti40 wrote: I had continued pain...as in a tightness...at the end of the day for several months.  It seems that the more I did (I'm a kindergarten teacher, and I went back to work 6 weeks after the BMX), the more I felt that tightness. If it helps, I'm 10 months out now, and I don't notice it as much any more.
